name: The Hollow (Skarlett)
description:
You've fallen in a dark cave with evil entities lurking in the shadows... Touch certain rocks in to collect pieces that will  help you escape and defeat the monsters in order to get to your freedom!

NOTE: At the moment, there is no indication to where the hidden pieces (there are 4 in total for now), so you must touch every rock in order to find them...:P This is still a work in progress and things are still  missing to make the game complete.

CONTROLS:

To START Game: Use MOUSE to click START button

Walk: W-A-S-D

Shoot: Arrow Keys (all directions)
